definition: hairdressing/to give sb's hair a cut or other beauty treatment/beautiful hair

sentences.english: They all wore the most expensive clothes and had beautiful, long, curly hair.
sentences.chinese: 她們都穿着最昂貴的衣服，留着長長的美麗的鬈髮。

sentences.english: Her corn-coloured ringlets hung gaily about her face.
sentences.chinese: 她的玉米色的鬈髮嫵媚地掛在她的臉上。

sentences.english: Boon walked in and quieted the engine.
sentences.chinese: 布恩走進來，關掉髮動機。

sentences.english: These maths questions really baffled Xiao Ming.
sentences.chinese: 堆不會做的數學題，小明直髮怔。

sentences.english: The hair beautification comb which is convenient to carry does not easily pollute skin or clothing.
sentences.chinese: 該髮梳攜帶方便，不污染皮膚或衣物。

sentences.english: Tana was just a puppy when doctors noticed she had testicles.
sentences.chinese: 當醫生髮現Tana長了睾丸時，她還只是只小狗。

sentences.english: What‘s the total circulation of this journal?
sentences.chinese: 這份期刊的總髮行量是多少？

sentences.english: Reduce redness by using a green shades.
sentences.chinese: 用綠色打出陰影來掩蓋皮膚髮紅。

sentences.english: The first identity cards are expected to be issued in about 18months.
sentences.chinese: 第一張該類型身份卡預計在未來18個月內將被髮布。

sentences.english: Similarly, producers are not aware of where their published messages are sent.
sentences.chinese: 同樣，生產者也不會知道他們發佈的消息被髮往何處。

sentences.english: The student announces the work rather plentiful, the play broadcasts in the province television station.
sentences.chinese: 學生髮表作品頗豐，編導的課本劇在省電視臺播放。

sentences.english: The child presented with generalised redness of the skin and itching all over his body.
sentences.chinese: 這個孩子表現爲全身皮膚髮紅和瘙癢。

sentences.english: SHAKIR:Nay! if he desist not, We would certainly smite his forehead.
sentences.chinese: 絕不然，如果他不停止，我一定要抓住他的額髮。

sentences.english: Sometimes a normal vaginal discharge can irritate the skin.
sentences.chinese: 有些時候，正常的分泌物也可能使皮膚髮炎。

sentences.english: He buffed the wood until it shone.
Vajpayee said he was happy to see the healthy development of India-China relations in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 瓦傑帕伊表示，印中關係近年來不斷髮展，令人高興。

definition: beard/mustache or whiskers/facial hair/CL:撮[zuo3],根[gen1]/(coll.) bandit
hair worn in a bun or coil
